category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDVMetaExprApplyValidationOverride
preference.preference_description: Defines which, if any, of the Named Variant Expression meta-expression validation failure cases should be tolerated when applying a meta-expression to a BOMLine. Valid values are zero or more of the following strings: "AlwaysTrue", "AlwaysFalse".
